item.title: Shelli add a quote by Tori Amos
item.description: "I know I'm an acquired taste - I'm anchovies. And not everybody wants those hairy little things." -- Tori Amos

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Shelli add a quote by George Washington
item.description: "It is better to be alone than in bad company." -- George Washington

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Draw a crazy picture, Write a nutty poem, Sing a mumble-gumble song, Whistle through your comb. Do a loony-goony dance 'Cross the kitchen floor, Put something silly in the world That ain't been there before." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "If you are a dreamer come in If you are a dreamer a wisher a liar A hoper a pray-er a magic-bean-buyer If youre a pretender com sit by my fire For we have some flax golden tales to spin Come in! Come in!" -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Shelli add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you aren't cute, you may as well be clever." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Tori Amos
item.description: "Get off the cross, we need the wood." -- Tori Amos

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Tori Amos
item.description: "Never was a cornflake girl; Thought it was a good solution: hanging with the raisin girls." -- Tori Amos

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Cornelia Funke
item.description: "Books have to be heavy because the whole world's inside them." -- Cornelia Funke

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Shelli add a quote by John August
item.description: "A little nonsense now and then, Is cherished by the wisest men." -- John August

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "I want an Oompa-Loompa!' screamed Veruca." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Shelli add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Make it a rule never to give a child a book you would not read yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Tim Burton
item.description: "One person's craziness is another person's reality." -- Tim Burton

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Anna Dewdney
item.description: "No more of this llama drama!" -- Anna Dewdney

item.title: Shelli add a quote by Kate DiCamillo
item.description: "Reader, you must know that an interesting fate (sometimes involving rats, sometimes not) awaits almost everyone, mouse or man, who does not conform." -- Kate DiCamillo

item.title: Shelli add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house." -- George Carlin

item.title: Shelli add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things." -- George Carlin
